scripts.transpile-esm: npx tsc && npx tsc --outDir lib/default-esm && npx babel lib/*.js --out-dir lib/esm && npx babel lib/*.js --out-dir lib/default-esm --plugins=transform-commonjs,add-module-exports
scripts.dbuild: docker image rm -f sharebin && docker build . -t sharebin:latest -t sharebin:alpha-0.1.5
scripts.dpublish: docker image rm -f typedelta/sharebin:latest && docker tag sharebin:latest typedelta/sharebin:latest && docker push typedelta/sharebin:latest
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
